name: deanius-meteor-action-architecture
description: A reference project for an Action-Oriented Architecture for a Meteor application

scripts.doc:client: madge -j -f es6 -x 'server/|test|uni-method|meteor|immutable|redux-act|react|collections|server/main' imports/ | ruby scripts/tweak-deps.rb -x server/ | madge --stdin -i doc/deps-client-orig.svg
scripts.doc:server: madge -j -f es6 -x 'client/|test|uni-method|meteor|immutable|redux-act|components' imports/ | ruby scripts/tweak-deps.rb -x client/ | madge --stdin -i doc/deps-server-orig.svg
scripts.doc:save: madge -j -f es6 imports/ | ruby scripts/tweak-deps.rb | json_pp > doc/deps.json
scripts.doc:colorize: cat doc/deps-client-orig.svg | ruby scripts/colorize-svg.rb > doc/deps-client.svg; cat doc/deps-server-orig.svg | ruby scripts/colorize-svg.rb > doc/deps-server.svg;
scripts.doc:all: npm run doc:save && npm run doc:client && npm run doc:server && npm run doc:colorize && npm run doc:view
scripts.deploy: test -f config/settings_production.json && DEPLOY_HOSTNAME=galaxy.meteor.com meteor deploy meteor-trivia.meteorapp.com --settings config/settings_production.json || echo 'config/settings_production.json not found - aborting'
